So far so good, Phobia thought, he knew that if this war was to be 
won it would be the Predacons to win it. Unless he did something to 
change that.

I will bring you the parts you need, in return you must grant me 
amnesty for any part I've played in the war, a place to stay with 
limited privleges, and the agreement that I will never be required to 
raise a hand in a battle against my fellow Predacons.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster frowns as he hears Phobia's message.
> 
> "My technitians would have to doublecheck the equipment first. What 
do you 
> want for it?" he replies.
